eu.hydrologis.jgrass.uibuilder.swt
Class Span

java.lang.Object
  eu.hydrologis.jgrass.uibuilder.swt.Span
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Span>
 class Span
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Span>

A Span object represents a row or a column in the TableLayout.

Author:
Patrick Ohnewein

index

private final int index
The column or row index.

minSize

private int minSize
Defines the minimum width (column) or height (row) of the span.

prefSize

private int prefSize
Defines the preferred width (column) or height (row) of the span.

maxSize

private int maxSize
Defines the maximum width (column) or height (row) of the span.

size

private int size
Defines width (column) or height (row) of the span. If not set it is negative and prefSize will be returned.

dynamicSize

private boolean dynamicSize
Has the size of this span to be dynamic?

List of entries in this span.
